name: 3.4.1.01. Archaeological Find

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content:
A well-preserved ruin is found in your kingdom, with historical artifacts connected to the people who lived in your land long ago.

Effect: Lore +1. If you have a Museum, the discoverers donate 10,000 gp worth of historical artifacts to its collection (if you have multiple Museums, choose one as the recipient).
